title: Feel at home your first night! Fall in love with your 1 BR / 1 BA!

posting_body: IMT Cherry Creek - A place to call home!
Receive a storage unit for 50% off!**Restrictions apply; offer subject to change at any time.
When looking for the best apartments for rent in Denver, CO look no further than IMT Cherry Creek.
These apartments offer style, comfort and convenience to people of all lifestyles.
We offer an unbelievable selection of amenities sure to make your apartment living experience a blast.
Located just minutes from downtown Denver, we are close to anything you could possibly need.
If you will settle for nothing less than the best in apartment living, be sure to come to IMT Cherry Creek today.
These apartments offer a great selection of floor plans with one, two and three bedroom options from which you can choose.
You will be amazed when you see all of the spectacular features these floor plans hold.
You can enjoy the many convenient kitchen appliances, snuggle up next to the cozy fireplace and take a soak in the garden tub.
In our apartment community you can enjoy many great features both indoors and outdoors.
Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!
✓ Fully Equipped Kitchen with Microwave, Dishwasher
✓ Spectacular Views In Select Apartment Homes
✓ Vaulted Ceilings In Select Apartment Homes
✓ Wood Style Flooring in Upgraded Apartment Homes
✓ Online Resident Services: service requests & account information
✓ Online Resident Services: utilities connection & rent payment
✓ Two Heated Outdoor Swimming Pools & Spas
Allowed: Breed restrictions apply, no weight restrictions.
One Pet ($35 pet rent per apartment & $350 non-refundable pet fee).
